The good: The game and all the minigames are fun to play for months. The developers keep expanding the game. The bad: It turns into an idle/login game grindfest for weeks or months at a time once you get past the first 15 or so levels. The ugly: The ad removal battle pass is a 2 week subscription service, costs more than most other games, and can't be purchased with in-game currency. If you spend over $50 on a mobile game, you shouldn't ever have to watch ads again.

Now free on Play Pass it's good enough for a run through but if you are the collector type that wants a perfect file pick up the Steam version instead.

Now free on Play Pass it's good enough for a run through but if you are the collector type that wants a perfect file pick up the Steam version instead.

The ugly: The ad removal battle pass is a 2 week subscription service, costs more than most other games, and can't be purchased with in-game currency. If you spend over $50 on a mobile game, you shouldn't ever have to watch ads again.
